entry.title: Just Testing
entry.content:
This is just a test.

``` ruby Convert to Roman Numerals def to_roman year s = String.new d = {

1000 => "M",
 900 => "CM",
 500 => "D",
 400 => "CD",
 100 => "C",
  90 => "XC",
  50 => "L",
  40 => "XL",
  10 => "X",
   9 => "IX",
   5 => "V",
   4 => "IV",
   1 => "I"

} d.keys.sort.reverse_each do |k|

w,r = year.divmod(k)
s = s + d[k] * w
year = r

end s end ```
